title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. [Missing step description]
OB: No default value was set. After step 5, the OK button can still be used.
EB: Change the Display type to Combo Box. The expected result is that 'aaa' should be the default value. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR: New a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. [Missing step description]
